20110117160039.000|20110117160042.000|TR0|holiday honoring the Reverend Martin 
20110117160042.000|20110117160044.000|TR0|Luther King Jr.  Live pictures from 
20110117160044.000|20110117160047.000|TR0|Atlanta where King is buried.
20110117160047.000|20110117160049.000|TR0|

20110117160059.000|20110117160102.000|TR0|communist.  Much more on those comments

20110117160117.000|20110117160119.000|TR0|floods and mudslides in Oregon and

20110117160154.000|20110117160157.000|TR0|COSTELLO:  New shock waves in Haiti.  The 
20110117160157.000|20110117160159.000|TR0|former dictator known as "Baby Doc" is 
20110117160159.000|20110117160202.000|TR0|back after some 25 years in exile.  
20110117160202.000|20110117160204.000|TR0|Jean-Claude Duvalier's unexpected return 
20110117160204.000|20110117160207.000|TR0|comes as the country struggles to recover 
20110117160207.000|20110117160209.000|TR0|from an earthquake, a cholera epidemic, 
20110117160209.000|20110117160212.000|TR0|and an ongoing political crisis.
20110117160212.000|20110117160214.000|TR0|
20110117160214.000|20110117160217.000|TR0|CNN's John Zarrella joins us by phone from 
20110117160217.000|20110117160219.000|TR0|Port-au-Prince.
20110117160219.000|20110117160222.000|TR0|
20110117160222.000|20110117160224.000|TR0|John, where is "Baby Doc"?
20110117160224.000|20110117160227.000|TR0|
20110117160227.000|20110117160229.000|TR0|JOHN ZARRELLA, CNN CORRESPONDENT:  Well, 
20110117160229.000|20110117160232.000|TR0|right now, Carol, we are standing outside 
20110117160232.000|20110117160234.000|TR0|with probably at least a hundred other 
20110117160234.000|20110117160237.000|TR0|journalists outside the Karibe Hotel in an 
20110117160237.000|20110117160239.000|TR0|area -- what is known as Petionville, just 
20110117160239.000|20110117160242.000|TR0|up a hilltop outside of Port-au-Prince, 
20110117160242.000|20110117160244.000|TR0|the city of Port-au- Prince.
20110117160244.000|20110117160247.000|TR0|
20110117160247.000|20110117160249.000|TR0|He is inside and expected to hold a news 
20110117160249.000|20110117160252.000|TR0|conference here.  It was supposed to start 
20110117160252.000|20110117160254.000|TR0|about an hour ago.  It has still not 
20110117160254.000|20110117160257.000|TR0|gotten under way.
20110117160257.000|20110117160259.000|TR0|
20110117160259.000|20110117160302.000|TR0|And, you know, when he arrived here 
20110117160302.000|20110117160304.000|TR0|yesterday, it was certainly an absolute 
20110117160304.000|20110117160307.000|TR0|shock, to say the least, to everyone here. 
20110117160307.000|20110117160309.000|TR0| No one expected him, but most everyone 
20110117160309.000|20110117160312.000|TR0|now in this country who has a radio knows 
20110117160312.000|20110117160314.000|TR0|that he is here because local radio 
20110117160314.000|20110117160317.000|TR0|stations have, of course, been talking 
20110117160317.000|20110117160319.000|TR0|about it constantly, his return here after 
20110117160319.000|20110117160322.000|TR0|25 years in exile in France.
20110117160322.000|20110117160324.000|TR0|
20110117160324.000|20110117160327.000|TR0|He was deposed in a popular uprising back 
20110117160327.000|20110117160329.000|TR0|in February of 1986, and left the country, 
20110117160329.000|20110117160332.000|TR0|went to France, and has been there pretty 
20110117160332.000|20110117160334.000|TR0|much ever since.  So it's an interesting 
20110117160334.000|20110117160337.000|TR0|equation, because right now it's unclear 
20110117160337.000|20110117160339.000|TR0|why he's here.  He's apparently said that 
20110117160339.000|20110117160342.000|TR0|he may only stay for three days, that he 
20110117160342.000|20110117160344.000|TR0|actually came back just because he saw 
20110117160344.000|20110117160347.000|TR0|images of the -- from the anniversary 
20110117160347.000|20110117160349.000|TR0|coverages and saw the great despair that 
20110117160349.000|20110117160352.000|TR0|is still here, and decided he had to come 
20110117160352.000|20110117160354.000|TR0|back.
20110117160354.000|20110117160357.000|TR0|
20110117160357.000|20110117160359.000|TR0|Now, back in Miami, where we left this

20110117160402.000|20110117160404.000|TR0|sentiment from the Miami-Haitian community

20110117160544.000|20110117160547.000|TR0|People disappeared.  There are also 
20110117160547.000|20110117160549.000|TR0|allegations he raped Haiti of hundreds of 
20110117160549.000|20110117160552.000|TR0|millions of dollars.
20110117160552.000|20110117160554.000|TR0|
20110117160554.000|20110117160557.000|TR0|So couldn't they arrest him for doing that?
20110117160557.000|20110117160559.000|TR0|
20110117160559.000|20110117160602.000|TR0|ZARRELLA:  Yes, that's very true.  In 
20110117160602.000|20110117160604.000|TR0|fact, Rene Preval said back in 2007 that 
20110117160604.000|20110117160607.000|TR0|if he ever returned, that -- the current 
20110117160607.000|20110117160609.000|TR0|president of Haiti -- said that in fact he 
20110117160609.000|20110117160612.000|TR0|would be arrested and have to stand trial 
20110117160612.000|20110117160614.000|TR0|for those crimes that he's alleged to have 
20110117160614.000|20110117160617.000|TR0|committed.
20110117160617.000|20110117160619.000|TR0|
20110117160619.000|20110117160622.000|TR0|Of course, he has been vehemently denying 
20110117160622.000|20110117160624.000|TR0|that he took hundreds of millions of 
20110117160624.000|20110117160627.000|TR0|dollars out of the country and vehemently 
20110117160627.000|20110117160629.000|TR0|denying that, you know, that he's 
20110117160629.000|20110117160632.000|TR0|responsible for anybody's disappearances 
20110117160632.000|20110117160634.000|TR0|or deaths back in the reign that he had 
20110117160634.000|20110117160637.000|TR0|from 1971 to 1986, that 15-year reign. But

20110117160720.000|20110117160722.000|TR0|
20110117160722.000|20110117160725.000|TR0|The Duvalier family ruled Haiti for three 
20110117160725.000|20110117160727.000|TR0|decades with fear and repression, and 
20110117160727.000|20110117160730.000|TR0|forced by a bloody secret police force 
20110117160730.000|20110117160732.000|TR0|known as Tonton Macoute.  Francois "Papa 
20110117160732.000|20110117160735.000|TR0|Doc" Duvalier was elected president in 
20110117160735.000|20110117160737.000|TR0|1957. He later declared himself "president 
20110117160737.000|20110117160740.000|TR0|for life."
20110117160740.000|20110117160742.000|TR0|
20110117160742.000|20110117160745.000|TR0|He succeeded in 1971 by Jean-Claude "Baby 
20110117160745.000|20110117160747.000|TR0|Doc" Duvalier, the man we're talking 
20110117160747.000|20110117160750.000|TR0|about.  He was 19 years old at the time.  
20110117160750.000|20110117160752.000|TR0|The younger Duvalier held on to power for 
20110117160752.000|20110117160755.000|TR0|15 years.  He and his wife Michelle were 
20110117160755.000|20110117160757.000|TR0|accused of stealing millions of dollars of 
20110117160757.000|20110117160800.000|TR0|public funds.  In 1986, they were forced 
20110117160800.000|20110117160802.000|TR0|to flee to France, where they lived in 
20110117160802.000|20110117160805.000|TR0|luxury.
20110117160805.000|20110117160807.000|TR0|
20110117160807.000|20110117160810.000|TR0|Now on to Tucson and more encouraging news 
20110117160810.000|20110117160812.000|TR0|about Congresswoman Gabrielle Giffords.
20110117160812.000|20110117160815.000|TR0|
20110117160815.000|20110117160817.000|TR0|Doctor have upgraded her condition from 
20110117160817.000|20110117160820.000|TR0|critical to serious, and they say she 
20110117160820.000|20110117160822.000|TR0|continues to do well.  Giffords is off the 
20110117160822.000|20110117160825.000|TR0|ventilator and breathing on her own 
20110117160825.000|20110117160827.000|TR0|through a tracheotomy tube inserted over 
20110117160827.000|20110117160830.000|TR0|the weekend.  A fellow lawmaker says 
20110117160830.000|20110117160832.000|TR0|Giffords is making both sides of her body 
20110117160832.000|20110117160835.000|TR0|and making progress every day.
20110117160835.000|20110117160837.000|TR0|

20110117160845.000|20110117160847.000|TR0|peace.

20110117160855.000|20110117160857.000|TR0|was also a chance for the community to 
20110117160857.000|20110117160900.000|TR0|heal. Participants cheered as they walked

20110117160910.000|20110117160912.000|TR0|and gave his for it."  Those words from 
20110117160912.000|20110117160915.000|TR0|the widow of Dorwan Stoddard, the Arizona 
20110117160915.000|20110117160917.000|TR0|shooting victim who died shielding his 
20110117160917.000|20110117160920.000|TR0|wife from gunfire.  Family and friends 
20110117160920.000|20110117160922.000|TR0|gathered for Stoddard's funeral in Tucson. 
20110117160922.000|20110117160925.000|TR0| His widow Mavy was shot three times in 
20110117160925.000|20110117160927.000|TR0|the legs.  She remembers how he tried to

20110117161100.000|20110117161102.000|TR0|
20110117161102.000|20110117161105.000|TR0|TRENT HUMPHRIES, TUCSON TEA PARTY FOUNDER  
20110117161105.000|20110117161107.000|TR0|&  ORGANIZER:  I was making the point that 
20110117161107.000|20110117161110.000|TR0|sometimes we're really quick to jump on 
20110117161110.000|20110117161112.000|TR0|political angles.  And maybe we need to 
20110117161112.000|20110117161115.000|TR0|slow down and look at the victims first, 
20110117161115.000|20110117161117.000|TR0|and then have a discussion about the

20110117161125.000|20110117161127.000|TR0|picture of me, and said, "You're dead."  
20110117161127.000|20110117161130.000|TR0|You know?  And then -- and then that's

20110117162203.000|20110117162206.000|TR0|CORRESPONDENT:  Well, you know, the 
20110117162206.000|20110117162208.000|TR0|numbers really shocked me, especially as a 
20110117162208.000|20110117162211.000|TR0|parent.  They looked at 3,000 kids between 
20110117162211.000|20110117162213.000|TR0|about third and eighth grade, and nearly 
20110117162213.000|20110117162216.000|TR0|10 percent of them were considered 
20110117162216.000|20110117162218.000|TR0|pathological gamers according to this.  So 
20110117162218.000|20110117162221.000|TR0|that's a lot of kids.
20110117162221.000|20110117162223.000|TR0|
20110117162223.000|20110117162226.000|TR0|Do you know how many hours a week they 
20110117162226.000|20110117162228.000|TR0|were gaming, these kids?  COSTELLO:  I was 
20110117162228.000|20110117162231.000|TR0|just going to ask you, what's pathological?
20110117162231.000|20110117162233.000|TR0|
20110117162233.000|20110117162236.000|TR0|COHEN:  We'll get to that in a second, but 
20110117162236.000|20110117162238.000|TR0|just the sheer number, 30 hours a week or
